dcterms:creator: S. Jaeger
A. Karargyris
S. Antani
G. Thoma
dcterms:description: A dataset containing posteroanterior chest x-rays collected during the tuberculosis control program organized by the Department of Health and Human Services of Montgomery County, Maryland. It includes images with and without tuberculosis manifestations.
dcterms:title: Montgomery County Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset developed by Shenzhen hospital containing chest x-rays, with a focus on images of patients with tuberculosis and normal cases.
dcterms:title: Shenzhen Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Shiraishi
S. Katsuragawa
J. Ikezoe
T. Matsumoto
T. Kobayashi
K. Komatsu
M. Matsui
H. Fujita
Y. Kodera
K. Doi
dcterms:description: A digital image database for chest radiographs that includes images with and without lung nodules, used for evaluating the performance of radiologists.
dcterms:title: JSRT Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset that is not explicitly referenced in the paper, but is mentioned as being used for the diagnosis of tuberculosis.
dcterms:title: Schezien Dataset
